attributes.action: BAN all halal slaughter and the import of halal meat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is barbaric and  cruel. As a Christian, I am deeply offended by this ferocious and brutal slaughter of our animals. Why should this Government allow this to happen - is it because they are so afraid of upsetting this minority. I, and I’m sure the majority of people, would like to see this outlawed completely. Just remember this is not a muslim country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
